reason: Duplicate of q_1_0738 (batch_0042): same topic (교육전문직원의 전직), identical answer content. Question is generic ('전체적인 내용을 요약해주세요').
Bad question: asks for the overall structure of 경기도교육공무원인사관리세부기준, but the answer only covers content from page 51. The 세부기준 spans many pages. Answer is also a raw dump of the source text.
Duplicate of q_1_0754: identical answer content. Question focuses on 전직등의 제한 criteria but the answer covers much broader content including 교원의 전직.
Duplicate of q_1_0754 and q_1_0755: identical answer content from the same source page and section.

Bad question: asks about '흔히 발생하는 문제점' (commonly occurring problems) when applying transfer restriction rules, but the answer just lists the rules themselves without discussing any problems. Raw dump of source text.
Duplicate of q_1_0759: nearly identical answer about the same topic. Also a raw dump of source text with minimal formatting.
Specific question about 당연퇴직 cases. Answer accurately lists all 11 결격사유 from 국가공무원법 제33조 verified against page 53. Well-structured and properly reformulated as a helpful response.

Specific question about the 20-year restriction for minor sex crimes. Answer correctly identifies the 20-year period and accurately lists the 5 qualifying conditions (가~마) from 제33조 제6의4호, all verified against page 53.
Specific question about 결격사유. Answer comprehensively lists all items from 국가공무원법 제33조 with correct time periods, verified against page 53. Distinct from q_1_0776 (different angle: 결격사유 vs 당연퇴직).

Duplicate of q_1_0776: nearly identical question ('어떤 것들이 있나요' vs '언제인가요') about 당연퇴직. Answer is also incomplete, listing only 8 items while omitting items 6의2 (횡령/배임 300만원), 6의3 (성폭력범죄 100만원), and 6의4 (미성년자 성범죄 20년).
